GoldMedallion.NAME: Gold Medallion
GoldMedallion.FLAVOR: Don't let it get to your head.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Upon defeating Elites, obtain 1 Pride.

Megaphone.NAME: Megaphone
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose [E] at the start of each turn. The first card you play each turn is played twice.

Ruby.NAME: Ruby
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 7 attacks, add a random attack to your hand and gain 2 [E].

Emerald.NAME: Emerald
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 6 skills, add a random skill to your hand and gain 2 [E].

Sapphire.NAME: Sapphire
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 4 powers, add a random power to your hand and gain 2 [E].

TwilightShard.NAME: Twilight Shard
TwilightShard.FLAVOR: Fleeting light shines from this stone.

MonkeysToyBox.NAME: Monkey's Toy Box
MonkeysToyBox.FLAVOR: You can find all kinds of wacky trinkets in here!

ChipBag.NAME: Bag of Chips
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of 10 combats, heal 4 HP.

TheDonut.NAME: The Donut
TheDonut.FLAVOR: Beware, eat too many of these and you'll get sleepy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Start each combat with 2 less Dexterity.

RappingBowl.NAME: Rapping Bowl
RappingBowl.FLAVOR: The less lines you havta spit, the ezier you can freestyle.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with 5 Strength and Dexterity. Lose 1 Strength and Dexterity for every 5 cards in your deck.
